title: Replay Ops Hardening Follow-up
description: Stabilize and document replay-adjacent operational surfaces observed in recent runs: workspace display-name route persistence/sync, container run entrypoint consistency, and interactive-terminal launch reliability.
goals: Ensure workspace display-name updates are persisted and mirrored consistently in route behavior.
Eliminate ambiguous container startup behavior across root and nested invocation paths.
Harden interactive-terminal release launch flow and operational checks for replay workflows.
success_criteria: Route-level validation confirms display_name and name fields remain synchronized after update operations.
Container run command succeeds consistently from the supported canonical working directory with clear fallback guidance.
Interactive-terminal release build and launch checks are reproducible and documented for operators.

steps.task: Audit current behavior and constraints for display-name route updates, container run path handling, and interactive-terminal launch expectations.
Design a minimal implementation plan with scoped fixes, verification commands, and rollout notes for the three operational surfaces.
